QuestData.Title: How to Save a Life
QuestData.Description: Gunny is dying from a powerful curse, $n.$B$BGrand Warlock Nethekurse augments his power with a pair of mystical braziers. If you bring me an ember from that brazier, perhaps it can counteract the dark magic?
QuestData.LogDescription: Advance Scout Chadwick inside the Shattered Halls of Hellfire Citadel wants you to bring him a Fel Ember.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you bring the ember? We don't have much time!
